Class LogicController

java.lang.Object
LogicController
public class LogicController extends Object
Controls the logic of the calendar application, including account management, calendar management, and entry operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LogicController()
    Constructs a LogicController and initializes all lists and indices.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentMonth

      public int getCurrentMonth()
      Returns the current month (0â€“11) in the system's time zone.
      Returns:
      The current month index.

    • authenticateAccount

      public boolean authenticateAccount(String username, String password)
      Authenticates the provided username and password. If matched, sets the accountIndex to the corresponding user.
      Parameters:
      username - The input username.
      password - The input password.
      Returns:
      true if authentication is successful and the account is active, and false otherwise.

    • logoutAccount

      public void logoutAccount()
      Logs out the current account and clears selected calendar.

    • addAccount

      public void addAccount(String username, String password)
      Adds a new account with a default calendar for the current year.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for the new account.
      password - The password for the new account.

    • deactivateAccount

      public void deactivateAccount()
      Deactivates the currently logged-in account.

    • existingUsername

      public boolean existingUsername(String username)
      Checks if a username already exists.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      true if username exists, false otherwise.

    • addCalendarObject

      public void addCalendarObject(String username, String CalendarObjectName, boolean isPublic)
      Adds a new calendar to the system if it does not already exist. The calendar can be public or private and will be associated with the given user. If a calendar with the same name and visibility already exists, it will not be added.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account creating the calendar.
      CalendarObjectName - the name/title of the calendar to be created.
      isPublic - true if the calendar should be public; false if it should be private.

    • addCalendarInstance

      public boolean addCalendarInstance(CalendarObject calendarObject)
      Adds an existing CalendarObject to the system.
      Parameters:
      calendarObject - The CalendarObject to add.
      Returns:
      true if successfully added, false if null.

    • removeCurrentCalendarObject

      public void removeCurrentCalendarObject()
      Removes the currently selected calendar from the system.

    • addEntryToCurrentCalendarObject

      public void addEntryToCurrentCalendarObject(String title, String description, long startTime, long endTime)
      Adds a new entry to the currently selected calendar.
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the entry.
      description - Description of the entry.
      startTime - Start time in milliseconds since epoch.
      endTime - End time in milliseconds since epoch.

    • editEntryInCurrentCalendarObject

      public void editEntryInCurrentCalendarObject(Entry oldEntry, Entry newEntry)
      Edits an existing entry in the currently selected calendar.
      Parameters:
      oldEntry - The entry to replace.
      newEntry - The new entry data.

    • removeEntryFromCurrentCalendarObject

      public void removeEntryFromCurrentCalendarObject(String title)
      Removes an entry from the currently selected calendar based on title.
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the entry to remove.

    • convertToPublic

      public void convertToPublic(String CalendarObjectName)
      Converts a calendar to public visibility by name.
      Parameters:
      CalendarObjectName - Name of the calendar to convert.

    • setAccountIndex

      public void setAccountIndex(int index)
      Sets the current account index.
      Parameters:
      index - Index to set as current account.

    • setCalendarObjectIndex

      public void setCalendarObjectIndex(int index)
      Sets the current calendar object index.
      Parameters:
      index - Index to set as current calendar.

    • getCurrentAccount

      public Account getCurrentAccount()
      Returns the currently logged-in account.
      Returns:
      The current Account or null if none.

    • getPublicCalendarObjects

      public ArrayList<CalendarObject> getPublicCalendarObjects()
      Returns all public calendars in the system.
      Returns:
      List of public CalendarObjects.

    • getPrivateCalendarObjects

      public ArrayList<CalendarObject> getPrivateCalendarObjects()
      Returns all private calendars owned by the current account.
      Returns:
      List of private CalendarObjects owned by the user.

    • getCurrentCalendarObject

      public CalendarObject getCurrentCalendarObject()
      Returns the currently selected calendar object.
      Returns:
      The selected CalendarObject or null if none.

    • getCalendarFromName

      public int getCalendarFromName(String CalendarObjectName, boolean isPublic)
      Returns the index of a calendar by name and visibility.
      Parameters:
      CalendarObjectName - Name of the calendar.
      isPublic - Whether the calendar is public.
      Returns:
      Index of the matching calendar or -1 if not found.

    • getAccountFromIndex

      public int getAccountFromIndex(String username)
      Returns the index of the account with the specified username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to search for.
      Returns:
      the index of the matching account, or -1 if not found.

    • setSelectedMonth

      public void setSelectedMonth(int month)
      Sets the selected month for calendar operations.
      Parameters:
      month - the month to set (1â€“12). Ignored if out of range.

    • getSelectedMonth

      public int getSelectedMonth()
      Returns the currently selected month.
      Returns:
      the selected month (1â€“12).

    • setSelectedYear

      public void setSelectedYear(int year)
      Sets the selected year for calendar operations.
      Parameters:
      year - the year to set (must be between 1970 and 2998). Ignored if out of range.

    • getSelectedYear

      public int getSelectedYear()
      Returns the currently selected year.
      Returns:
      the selected year.

    • checkCalendarDuplicate

      public boolean checkCalendarDuplicate(String calendarName, boolean isPublic, String username)
      Checks whether a calendar with the specified name and visibility already exists. Public calendar names must be globally unique. Private calendar names must be unique across all private calendars.
      Parameters:
      calendarName - the name of the calendar to check.
      isPublic - true if checking for a public calendar; false if private.
      username - the username of the account attempting to create the calendar.
      Returns:
      true if a duplicate exists; false otherwise.
